thread.title: Tucker Destroys BuzzFeed Editor Who Likens Himself to Matt Drudge
thread.title_full: Tucker Destroys BuzzFeed Editor Who Likens Himself to Matt Drudge

author: Harris
title: Tucker Destroys BuzzFeed Editor Who Likens Himself to Matt Drudge
text:
U.S. Border Patrol: Trump’s Border Wall Is EXACTLY What We Need 
Even though the man had given a sworn statement to police, Carlson said, “Most of us chose not to repeat those charges because we didn’t want to amplify them because we didn’t know if they were true and by repeating them we would do grave damage to a man’s reputation, in this case Obama, who I’d never liked but I just thought it was unfair to report that. 
Then he hit Smith with the zinger, “You just don’t like Trump. That’s the difference.” 
In another moment, Tucker told Smith exactly what he was, and it was epic. 
“Clearly BuzzFeed News has a pretty open political agenda masquerading as journalism,” Carlson said. “I think you’re hiding behind what appear to be journalistic standards when they are in fact they’re political imperatives.” 
Boom. 
Be sure to share this story on Facebook and Twitter and add your thoughts and opinions to the comment section below. What do you think about BuzzFeed's decision to release the unverified dossier? Scroll down to comment below! Advertisement Popular Right Now
